MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the ML3 postcode area Hamilton. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11:04pm. Our engineers are on their way to the local substation to investigate a suspected blown fuse and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:15am. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:21 PM on Thursday, 28 January 2021.
